results.content: Due to the continuous changes and critical language definition of Java Script not all examples work out. See use of brackets and sublime and the very first examples of external js. This is due to the issue "JS" and the course needs a maintenance.

response.content: That is actually incorrect. if written correctly each code works out and this was written in standards up to date. it is not a course for ECMAScript 2015. It is the basics of JavaScript with a bearing on Meteor which still match all standards up to date. Thank you for your review.

results.content: If you are new to JS and Meteor as a whole and want to learn the basics this course is perfect for you! All and all the course was very well done and informative, my only critique would be to have more code exercises/questions to cement the teachings a bit better but if you code-a-long with the lessons throughout​ the course this will definitely help with that.
